mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM comment WHERE bno = #{bno}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO comment (bno, pcno, comment, commenter, reg_date, up_date) VALUES (#{bno}, #{pcno}, #{comment}, #{commenter}, now(), now())
mapper.select: SELECT cno , bno , ifnull(pcno, cno) as pcno , comment , commenter , reg_date , up_date , (SELECT userNickname FROM user u WHERE u.userId = c.commenter) as userNickname FROM comment c WHERE bno = #{bno} ORDER BY pcno ASC, cno ASC
